These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.
Do you want to let members view polls? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow polls to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow polls to be viewed.

column1: Yes, allow viewing of all polls, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow viewing of all polls, even private ones.
Do you want to let members delete polls? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow members to delete their polls.
column2: No, do not allow members to delete their polls.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete their own polls.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete their own polls.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete all polls.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete all polls.

column1: Do you want to allow members to create polls?
column2: Do you want to allow members to create polls?

column1: No, do not allow this member level to create polls
column2: No, do not allow this member level to create polls

column1: Yes, allow this member level to create polls
column2: Yes, allow this member level to create polls
Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their poll. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view polls.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their poll. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post comments on the poll.

column1: These settings affect all members in your community.
column2: These settings affect all members in your community.

Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Blogs, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

column1: Yes, the public can view polls unless they are made private.
column2: Yes, the public can view polls unless they are made private.

column1: No, the public cannot view polls.
column2: No, the public cannot view polls.

column1: How many polls will be shown per page? (Enter a number between 1 and 999)
column2: How many polls will be shown per page? (Enter a number between 1 and 999)

column1: Are you sure that you want to delete this poll? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.
column2: Are you sure that you want to delete this poll? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.
